title: Dear Fantasy
lyrics:
Oneul-eul gidalyeoss-eo hancham-eul hemaeida
Olaen sigan neoman neoman-eul balaewass-eo
Somsatang gat-eun nunbich
Dalkomhan geu hyang-gie salang-i wa
Nae mam-eun seuleuleu nog-anaelyeo

Jigeum nae ap-e seo issneun neo

I sinbiloun ikkeullim-e onjong-il seolleeo



Naegen neoman lovely lovely lovelyhae

Naman-ui lovely lovely love

Hangsang geudaewa hamkkehalgeyo Oh uli yagsoghaeyo

Salanghaeyo darling darling darling oh

Naman-ui darling yeong-wonhaeyo

Hangsang nae gyeot-e iss-eojullaeyo

Naleul balghyeojwoyo Forever with you



Eojjeomyeon ileolkkayo cheoeum neukkin dugeungeolim

Haes-sal gat-eun miso jakku aleungeolyeo

Naega wae ileolkkayo seolleneun balgeol-eum-i

Nado mollae hangeol-eum hangeol-eum

Geudael hyanghaega



Jigeum nae ap-e seo issneun neo

I sinbiloun ikkeullim-e onjong-il seolleeo



Naegen neoman lovely lovely lovelyhae

Naman-ui lovely lovely love

Hangsang geudaewa hamkkehalgeyo oh uli yagsoghaeyo

Salanghaeyo darling darling darling oh

Naman-ui darling yeong-wonhaeyo

Hangsang nae gyeot-e iss-eojullaeyo

Naleul balghyeojwoyo Forever with you



Hangaloi hanjeoghan saebyeog sigan

Seololeul bichuneun boleumdal (You)

Hyang-giui kkeut-eun eodiilkka jjoch-aga

Heunjeog-e han baljjag (Yeah!)

Chueog-eul doesaegyeo dodol-ipyo

Ne ileum geu da-eum-eneun comma

Geuligo nalo chaeul geoya uli iyagieseon

Bol su eobs-eo machimpyo



Neon naman-ui angel angel angel oh

Sojunghan angel my angel

Byeonham-eobs-i neul gyeot-e iss-eoyo uli yagsoghaeyo



Naegen neoman lovely lovely lovelyhae

Naman-ui lovely lovely love

Hangsang geudaewa hamkkehalgeyo oh uli yagsoghaeyo

Salanghaeyo darling darling darling oh

Naman-ui darling yeong-wonhaeyo

Hangsang nae gyeot-e iss-eojullaeyo

Naleul balghyeojwoyo Forever with you
